glsa.title: flac123: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: flac123 is affected by a buffer overflow vulnerability, which could allow for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: flac123 is a command-line application for playing FLAC audio files.

description.p: A possible buffer overflow vulnerability has been reported in the local__vcentry_parse_value() function in vorbiscomment.c.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to play a specially crafted audio file, which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All flac123 users should upgrade to the latest version:
